thread.title: Backlash after video game simulates school shooting

title: Backlash after video game simulates school shooting
text:
Backlash after video game simulates school shooting Tuesday, May 29, 2018 - 01:39
A new video game that simulates a school shooting is provoking outrage from lawmakers and parents of victims in recent mass killings. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A new video game that simulates a school shooting is provoking outrage from lawmakers and parents of victims in recent mass killings. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2L6iuLc
